name: Ballet
description: Ballet is a classical dance form characterized by grace, precision, and fluid movements.

name: Hip Hop
description: Hip Hop is a high-energy dance style that originated in urban communities, known for its street-inspired moves and improvisation.

name: Break Dance
description: Break Dance, also known as B-boying or breaking, is an acrobatic and athletic dance style that emerged from hip-hop culture, featuring impressive moves such as spins, flips, and freezes.

name: Classic
description: Classic dance refers to traditional and formal dance styles rooted in cultural heritage and classical techniques.

name: BharatNatyam
description: BharatNatyam is a classical Indian dance form characterized by intricate footwork, expressive gestures, and storytelling.

name: Salsa
description: Salsa is a lively and passionate dance style originating from Latin America, known for its energetic movements and rhythmic patterns.

name: Jazz
description: Jazz dance combines elements of ballet, modern dance, and African-American rhythms to create a dynamic and expressive style.
